mapper.sql: ANL_VAR_ID, DMNG_LNM, DMN_RNK, DMN_PRB, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, WRIT_DTM, WRIT_USER_ID
mapper.select: -- 도메인판별결과 조회 by 변수ID SELECT ANL_VAR_ID, DMNG_LNM , IFNULL(DMN_PRB, 0) * 100 AS DMN_PRB , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY ANL_VAR_ID ORDER BY IFNULL(DMN_PRB,0) DESC) AS DMN_RNK FROM WAD_DMN_PDT_NSTND WHERE ANL_VAR_ID = #{anlVarId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY DMN_RNK
mapper.insert:
insert into WAD_DMN_PDT_NSTND
ANL_VAR_ID, DMNG_LNM,
DMN_RNK,
DMN_PRB,
OBJ_DESCN,
OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, WRIT_DTM, WRIT_USER_ID,
#{anlVarId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dmngLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dmnRnk,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{dmnPrb,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
1, 'C', now(), #{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update WAD_DMN_PDT_NSTND
DMN_RNK = #{dmnRnk,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DMN_PRB = #{dmnPrb,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WRIT_DTM = #{writDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WRIT_USER_ID = #{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ANL_VAR_ID = #{anlVarId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DMNG_LNM = #{dmngLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
